Reviews.Title: “The bronx of London”
Reviews.Author: SMG8876
Reviews.Content: start positive receptionist tried help nice guy woman friendly tried maximum happy experience bed bugs people wrote 10 price television bathroom okay en suite bed coffe tea gratis negative location waited luggage boyfriend exit metro searched hotel easy directly unsafe watched people living night uncomfortable walk 10 15 min hotel hotel bb situated mainstreet night horrible loud person wrote choice sleeping sauna cos heater control trying sleep noises entered bb bad smell garlic mixed else kitchen fortunately infected smell able enter kitchen time day breakfast toast orange juice tea cornflakes thats price cup example dirty feel sitting bar cos tables facing wall unforgettable smell owner little bit unpolite london expensive paid 50 pounds night city center easy 10 min walking nearly 15 train book hotel save money possibility 10

Reviews.Title: “"very bad experience"”
Reviews.Author: sameera186338
Reviews.Content: hotel value receptionist nice professional guy night receptionist rude horrible disgusting totally am told 1200 pm otherwise wont able guys inn cost own rude breakfast check 10 told day receptionist check time 1100am day guy employee am owner listen follow bad experience guy

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: MD11junkie
Reviews.Content: bb wouldnt actually call hotel located main attraction london 40 minute trip embankment counting 10 minute walk station bakerloo line located friendly tourist neighbourhood checked 2pm arrived belfast day obviously tired person manager smile nor hello confirmed reservation booked suite thats beds write home comfort bed bugs horrible easily solved buying spray nearby supermarket bathroom ok water pressure perfect breakfast european generous toasts butter margarine jam coffee cup decided refill bad look person preparing breakfast remark night clerk willing help called taxi woke 5am taxi arrived experience repeat recommend avoid hotel

Reviews.Title: “hell hole infested with bedbugs”
Reviews.Author: andi c
Reviews.Content: worst stayed life serious bed bugs half stay changed difference entire body head feet covered bites counted 40 separate bites constantly itching days absolutely disgusting showers dont properly chance getting clean considering staying advice yourself cardboard box head kings cross heaven compared hotel oh breakfast piece toast coffe world produced

Reviews.Title: “Bed bugs at no extra charge !!!”
Reviews.Author: marky77power
Reviews.Content: hotel worst stayed poor rubbish floor sheets pillow blood stains sheets clean bugs bed fast itch thinking slept top bed towels top clothed recommend

Reviews.Title: “Appalling and unsafe.”
Reviews.Author: star542
Reviews.Content: absolutely appalling described hotel understand able business paid ensuite single shabby single shared bathroom tv didnt teacoffee facilities broken lamp light bulb main light worse window close managers answer tape window shut spent 10 min tv insisted eventually moved stinking sink broken lamps time broken lock door unsafe sketchy wedge chair door shared bathroom hot water shower treated badly paid 2 nights following awful treatment cancel 2nd night refund refused feel robbed
